stations_dataset.description: Comprehensive EV charging stations dataset for India

fields.station_id: Unique identifier for each charging station
fields.data_source: Original source of the station data
fields.name: Station name or description
fields.network: Charging network the station belongs to
fields.city: City where the station is located
fields.state: State where the station is located
fields.charger_type: Type of charging (AC Slow/Fast, DC Fast/Ultra)
fields.estimated_cost_per_kwh: Estimated charging cost per kWh in INR

sessions_dataset.description: Realistic charging session logs based on station characteristics

fields.session_id: Unique identifier for each charging session
fields.energy_delivered_kwh: Amount of energy delivered in kWh
fields.total_cost_inr: Total cost of charging session in INR

analytics_summary.description: Comprehensive analytics and insights from the dataset
